test_cases.title: Create Sales Order with Valid Data
test_cases.description: Verify that a sales representative can create a sales order with all required fields filled correctly.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
Customer and product master data exist
test_steps: Navigate to Sales Order creation screen
Enter valid customer, product, quantity, price, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: Sales order is created, assigned a unique order number, status is 'Open', and order appears in the sales order list.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Create Sales Order with Missing Mandatory Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents creation of a sales order when mandatory fields are missing.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
test_steps: Navigate to Sales Order creation screen
Leave one or more mandatory fields (e.g., product or customer) blank
Attempt to save the sales order
test_cases.expected_results: System displays validation error and does not save the sales order.

test_cases.title: Boundary Test for Maximum Quantity in Sales Order
test_cases.description: Verify that the system accepts the maximum allowed quantity for a product in a sales order.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
Product has a defined maximum quantity
test_steps: Navigate to Sales Order creation screen
Enter maximum allowed quantity for a product
test_cases.expected_results: Sales order is created successfully with maximum quantity.

test_cases.title: Create Sales Order with Invalid Delivery Date
test_cases.description: Verify that the system rejects a sales order with a delivery date in the past.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
test_steps: Navigate to Sales Order creation screen
Enter a delivery date in the past
Attempt to save the sales order
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not save the sales order.

test_cases.title: Verify Sales Order Appears in List After Creation
test_cases.description: Ensure that a newly created sales order is visible in the sales order list.
test_steps: Search for the newly created order number
test_cases.expected_results: Sales order is displayed in the list with status 'Open'.

test_cases.title: Edit Sales Order Before Delivery
test_cases.description: Verify that a sales representative can edit an existing sales order before delivery is processed.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
test_steps: Edit order details (e.g., quantity or delivery date)
test_cases.expected_results: Order is updated, status remains 'Open', and changes are tracked in audit trail.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Edit Sales Order After Delivery
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents editing of sales orders after delivery is processed.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays an appropriate message.

test_cases.title: Audit Trail for Sales Order Edits
test_cases.description: Verify that all changes to sales orders are logged in the audit trail.
test_steps: Access audit trail for the order
test_cases.expected_results: Audit trail shows user, timestamp, and details of changes.

test_cases.title: Edit Sales Order with Invalid Data
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates updated information before saving edited sales order.
test_steps: Edit sales order and enter invalid data (e.g., negative quantity)
test_cases.expected_results: System displays validation error and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: View Sales Order Details
test_cases.description: Verify that a sales representative can view all details of a sales order.
preconditions: User is logged in as Sales Representative
test_cases.expected_results: System displays customer, items, pricing, status, delivery date, and order history.

test_cases.title: Access Sales Order Attachments
test_cases.description: Verify that order attachments are accessible from the sales order details view.
test_cases.expected_results: Attachment opens or downloads successfully.

test_cases.title: Search Sales Order by Order Number
test_cases.description: Verify that users can search for a sales order using the order number.
test_cases.expected_results: Sales order matching the order number is displayed.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Restriction on Viewing Sales Orders
test_cases.description: Verify that users without appropriate roles cannot view sales order details.
preconditions: User is logged in with restricted role
test_steps: Attempt to access sales order details
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and an appropriate message is displayed.

test_cases.title: Cancel Open Sales Order
test_cases.description: Verify that a sales representative can cancel a sales order with 'Open' status.
test_cases.expected_results: Order status changes to 'Cancelled', reason is recorded, inventory updated, and user/timestamp logged.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Cancel Delivered Sales Order
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents cancellation of sales orders after delivery.
test_steps: Attempt to cancel the delivered sales order
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not allow cancellation.

test_cases.title: Verify Inventory Update After Sales Order Cancellation
test_cases.description: Ensure that inventory and product availability are updated after a sales order is cancelled.
test_cases.expected_results: Inventory reflects the cancellation and availability is updated.

test_cases.title: Cancel Sales Order Without Reason
test_cases.description: Verify that the system requires a reason for cancellation.
test_steps: Attempt to cancel sales order without entering a reason
test_cases.expected_results: System displays validation error and does not cancel the order.

test_cases.title: Process Delivery for Open Sales Order
test_cases.description: Verify that a warehouse clerk can process delivery for an open sales order.
test_cases.expected_results: Delivery document is created, assigned a unique number, and order status is updated to 'Delivered'.

test_cases.title: Attempt Delivery with Insufficient Inventory
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents delivery processing if product is not available.
test_steps: Attempt to create delivery for the sales order
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not create delivery document.

test_cases.title: Verify Inventory Update After Delivery
test_cases.description: Ensure that inventory is reduced by delivered quantity after delivery processing.
preconditions: Delivery is processed for a sales order
test_cases.expected_results: Inventory is reduced by the delivered quantity.

test_cases.title: Edit Delivery Address Before Shipment
test_cases.description: Verify that a warehouse clerk can edit delivery address before shipment confirmation.
test_steps: Edit delivery address and contact details
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved, logged, and delivery status remains 'Open'.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Edit Delivery After Goods Issue
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents editing of delivery details after goods issue is posted.
preconditions: Delivery document exists with goods issue posted
test_steps: Attempt to edit delivery address or contact details
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays an appropriate message.

test_cases.title: Edit Delivery with Invalid Data
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates changes to delivery details before saving.
test_steps: Edit delivery address with invalid data (e.g., blank address)
test_cases.expected_results: System displays validation error and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Issue for Delivery
test_cases.description: Verify that a warehouse clerk can post goods issue for a delivery with 'Open' status.
test_steps: Navigate to Goods Issue posting screen
test_cases.expected_results: Goods issue is posted, inventory is reduced, delivery status is updated to 'Shipped', and user/timestamp are recorded.

test_cases.title: Attempt Duplicate Goods Issue Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents duplicate posting of goods issue for the same delivery.
preconditions: Goods issue already posted for delivery
test_steps: Attempt to post goods issue again for the same delivery
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents duplicate posting.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Issue with Insufficient Inventory
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents posting goods issue if inventory is insufficient.
preconditions: Inventory is less than delivery quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not post goods issue.

test_cases.title: Create Billing Document for Delivered Sales Order
test_cases.description: Verify that a billing clerk can create a billing document only for delivered sales orders.
test_cases.expected_results: Billing document is created, assigned a unique invoice number, includes all relevant information, and order status is updated to 'Billed'.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Create Billing for Undelivered Order
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents billing for orders not yet delivered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not create billing document.

test_cases.title: Edit Billing Document Before Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that a billing clerk can edit billing details before posting to FI.
preconditions: Billing document exists and not yet posted to FI
test_steps: Edit billing details (e.g., price or address)
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved, logged, and warnings are displayed for missing/incorrect data.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Edit Billing After FI Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that the system restricts editing of billing document after posting to FI.
preconditions: Billing document is posted to FI
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays warning.

test_cases.title: Edit Billing Document with Missing Data
test_cases.description: Verify that the system displays warnings for missing or incorrect data during billing edit.
preconditions: Billing document exists and not yet posted to FI
test_steps: Edit billing document and remove required data
test_cases.expected_results: System displays warning and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: Post Billing Document to FI Automatically
test_cases.description: Verify that posting a billing document to FI updates revenue and receivables in real time and generates FI document number.
preconditions: Billing document exists and ready for posting
test_steps: Check FI postings for revenue and receivables
Verify FI document number is linked
test_cases.expected_results: Billing is posted to FI automatically, accounts updated, FI document number generated and linked.

test_cases.title: Attempt Duplicate FI Posting for Billing Document
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents duplicate posting of the same billing document to FI.
preconditions: Billing document already posted to FI
test_steps: Attempt to post billing document to FI again
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents duplicate posting.

test_cases.title: Handle FI Posting Errors
test_cases.description: Verify that posting errors are logged and notified to the user during FI posting.
test_steps: Attempt to post billing document to FI
Trigger posting error (e.g., missing GL account)
test_cases.expected_results: Error is logged and user is notified with details.

test_cases.title: Automatic FI Integration for O2C Transactions
test_cases.description: Verify that all sales, delivery, and billing transactions are reflected in FI in real time without manual intervention.
test_cases.expected_results: All transactions are posted to FI automatically and traceable to originating transactions.

test_cases.title: FI Integration Error Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that the system provides error logs for failed FI integrations.
test_cases.expected_results: Error is logged and accessible for troubleshooting.

test_cases.title: View Standard O2C Reports
test_cases.description: Verify that standard reports for sales orders, deliveries, billings, and FI postings are available.
preconditions: User is logged in as Business Analyst
test_cases.expected_results: Reports display real-time data and are exportable to Excel/PDF.

test_cases.title: Filter O2C Reports by Customer and Date
test_cases.description: Verify that reports can be filtered by customer and date.
test_steps: Apply filter for specific customer and date range
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays filtered data as per criteria.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access to Reports
test_cases.description: Verify that access to reports is restricted based on user roles.
preconditions: User is logged in with restricted role
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and appropriate message is displayed.

test_cases.title: Assign Role-Based Access to Users
test_cases.description: Verify that system administrator can assign roles to users for O2C tasks.
preconditions: User is logged in as System Administrator
test_steps: Assign sales, warehouse, billing, finance, or admin role to user
test_cases.expected_results: Role is assigned and auditable in system logs.

test_cases.title: Unauthorized Access Attempt Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthorized access attempts are logged.
test_steps: Log in with a role not permitted for a function
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and attempt is logged in system.

test_cases.title: Update User Roles
test_cases.description: Verify that administrator can update user roles and changes are auditable.
preconditions: User is logged in as System Administrator
test_cases.expected_results: Role is updated and change is logged in audit trail.

test_cases.title: End-to-End O2C Process Flow Automation
test_cases.description: Verify that the system supports seamless transition from sales order creation to FI posting without manual intervention.
preconditions: Standard SAP configuration is in place
test_cases.expected_results: Each process step updates status automatically, no manual intervention required, and alerts are generated for failures.

test_cases.title: Prevent Skipping of Mandatory O2C Steps
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents skipping mandatory steps in O2C process.
preconditions: User attempts to skip a step
test_steps: Attempt to create billing document without delivery
Attempt to post FI without billing
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents skipping and displays error message.

test_cases.title: Audit Trail for O2C Transactions
test_cases.description: Verify that all changes to O2C transactions are logged and accessible to authorized users.
test_steps: Make changes to sales order, delivery, billing, and FI posting
Attempt to edit or delete audit logs
test_cases.expected_results: Audit trail shows all changes, is accessible, and cannot be edited or deleted.

test_cases.title: Export Audit Logs for Review
test_cases.description: Verify that audit logs can be exported for review.
test_steps: Export logs to Excel or PDF
test_cases.expected_results: Audit logs are exported successfully.

test_cases.title: Error Notification for Failed O2C Processing
test_cases.description: Verify that system notifies users of errors during O2C processing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays clear error message and sends notification to responsible user.

test_cases.title: Prevent Further Processing Until Error Resolved
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents further processing of O2C transaction until error is resolved.
test_steps: Attempt to proceed with next process step after error
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks processing until error is resolved, then allows continuation.

test_cases.title: Search O2C Documents by Multiple Criteria
test_cases.description: Verify that users can search and filter sales orders, deliveries, and billings by document number, customer, date, and status.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are displayed in real time and match criteria.

test_cases.title: Save Frequently Used Search Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that users can save frequently used search filters.
test_steps: Use saved filter for future searches
test_cases.expected_results: Saved filter is available and can be reused.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Restriction on Search Results
test_cases.description: Verify that access to search results is restricted by user role.
preconditions: User is logged in with restricted role
test_cases.expected_results: User only sees documents permitted by their role.

test_cases.title: Standard SAP Configuration for O2C Process
test_cases.description: Verify that system uses SAP standard order, delivery, and billing types for O2C process.
preconditions: SAP standard configuration is in place
test_cases.expected_results: All documents use SAP standard types, no custom development required.

test_cases.title: Verify Configuration Documentation Availability
test_cases.description: Ensure that configuration documentation is available for reference.
preconditions: System is configured using SAP best practices
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant documentation is available and accessible.

test_cases.title: Verify Status Updates at Each O2C Step
test_cases.description: Verify that status is updated automatically at each process step (order, delivery, billing, FI posting).
test_cases.expected_results: Status is updated automatically and logged in audit trail.

test_cases.title: Prevent Manual Status Overrides
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents manual status overrides for O2C documents.
test_steps: Attempt to manually change status of sales order, delivery, or billing document
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents manual status change and displays error.

test_cases.title: Status Change Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that status updates trigger notifications if configured.
test_steps: Perform O2C process step that changes status
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is sent to relevant users upon status change.

test_cases.title: Automated Flag for Manual Intervention in O2C Process
test_cases.description: Verify that system flags any step requiring manual intervention for review.
preconditions: O2C process step requires manual intervention
test_steps: Trigger a scenario where manual intervention is needed (e.g., exception)
test_cases.expected_results: System flags the step and reports to process owner.

test_cases.title: Metrics on Manual vs Automated Transactions
test_cases.description: Verify that system provides metrics on manual versus automated transactions.
test_steps: Review manual and automated transaction statistics
test_cases.expected_results: Metrics are displayed accurately for manual and automated transactions.

test_cases.title: Request Support for Automation Failure
test_cases.description: Verify that users can request support if automation fails in O2C process.
test_steps: Use system option to request support
test_cases.expected_results: Support request is logged and tracked for resolution.

summary: 59 comprehensive test cases have been generated, covering all user stories and requirements for SAP S/4HANA Order-to-Cash (O2C) process. The test cases include positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for sales order management, delivery, billing, FI integration, reporting, controls, automation, standard SAP configuration, and error handling.
